title: Effect of voter turnout on govt

content.prompt: Which of the following is most likely an effect of the data reported in the chart?

choices.label: Younger voters were more likely to vote in the 2016 presidential election.
The California state government is more likely to address issues that affect older voters.
Political parties will work to recruit more younger candidates to run for office.
The media will likely be skeptical of the general election results.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
